docs.text: up until about a year ago , john travolta's career consisted of those " look who's talking " movies ( notice how they never called them look who's talented ) and the 1991 bomb shout ( which was bad enough to make most people scream ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but somewhere along the line , travolta got the starring role in the tarantino masterpiece pulp fiction and his career soared once again .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: weird how someone whose career was on par with the bee gees back in 1978 would experience fame and fortune once again , while barry , robin and maurice gibb could do no better than a 1993 straight-to-the-cutout-bin album aptly named " size isn't everything " ( and of course , they learned that sales are everything ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but now travolta's back on the hollywood scene once again , and i think we all know why .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: four words : contract with the devil .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and this has nothing to do with newt gingrich's " contract with america . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no , satan is much more humane .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: anyway , yes , travolta has sold his soul to the hairy host of the netherworld .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how do i know ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i own the document in question .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: amazing what you can buy at those collector's shops for a few hundred dollars , isn't it ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: get shorty continues in the vein of pulp fiction , with travolta as crime minion chili palmer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he goes to collect some of the mafia's money from a b-grade director ( gene hackman ) and suddenly finds out he wants out of the mob game and into the movie game .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sure , a ruthless criminal like him is far too honest to make it in hollywood , but i guess that's beside the point .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: palmer is determined to get hackman's next project made , so he sets out to convince big star martin weir ( danny devito ) to star in the movie , bringing along down-and-out horror actress karen flores ( rene russo ) , who has already had affairs with hackman and devito .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it doesn't take a las vegas odds-maker to predict that she and travolta will soon be hitting the sheets as well , after the customary sexual tension and denial , which has been used in every comedy from " who's the boss ? "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: to speechless .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it works in this case , unlike " who's the boss ? "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although it's interesting to note that tony danza has signed a contract with the devil also .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: complicating matters somewhat are the mobsters who have backed hackman's other films and want in on this one too , along with travolta's mob boss trying to track him down for defecting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: get shorty is by no means on the same level as pulp fiction , despite the obvious similarities .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this movie doesn't have near the amount of originality or depth as pulp fiction but it is definitely one of the most entertaining movies i've seen this year ( yes , even better than halloween vi ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: get shorty is my kind of movie , one that mixes intelligent humor with action and violence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i'm definitely going to have to check out the novel it was based on .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: are you getting this , shorty ?
docs.label: positive
